net.sf.JRecord.Details

Interface IRecordDeciderX

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RecordDecider

    public interface IRecordDeciderX
extends RecordDecider
    Cobol Copybooks do not provide a means to determine which Record applies to a particular Data-Line. Most of the time this does not matter but there are exceptions (e.g. Constants.IO_CONTINOUS_NO_LINE_MARKER).

    One way to tell JRecord / RecordEditor which Record to use for a Data-line is to define a RecordDecider.

    This . 

       iobuilder.setRecordDecider(myRecordDecider);
    Author:
    Bruce Martin

    • Method Detail

      • setLayout

        void setLayout(LayoutDetail layout)
        Define the Layout to the RecordDecider. This method is called by the LayoutDetail class.

        This allows for better performing RecordDeciders.

        For internal JRecord use !!! *

        Parameters:
        layout - that uses the RecordDecider
